A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This may not be the worst SW movie ever made but it is the most un-SW SW movie ever made and is completely missing the SW magic. The way some character stories were handled was a huge slap in the face to fans. The core story could have been a plot point in Spaceballs. Someone’s sense of humor sucks. I have been thru double-digit viewings of every SW movie…Hope and Empire might be creeping towards 100 x I hated this movie and am heartbroken about it.
